column2: Do you have a favorable or unfavorable impression of Governor Brian Kemp?
Do you have a favorable or unfavorable impression of U.S. Senator David Perdue?
Do you have a favorable or unfavorable impression of former gubernatorial candidate Stacey Abrams?
Do you have a favorable or unfavorable impression of the Georgia Legislature?
Do you have a favorable or unfavorable impression of President Donald Trump?
Do you think abortion should be legal in all cases, legal in most cases, illegal in most cases or illegal in all cases?

In 1973 the Roe versus Wade decision established a woman's constitutional right to an abortion, at least in the first three months of pregnancy. Would you like to see the Supreme Court completely overturn its Roe versus Wade decision or not?

The Georgia Legislature is considering/has approved legislation that would ban virtually all abortions after six weeks of pregnancy, except in cases of rape and incest that are reported to authorities. Do you strongly support, somewhat support, neither support nor oppose, somewhat oppose, or strongly oppose this legislation?

Now that a summary of Special Counsel Robert Mueller's findings has been released, has what you've learned made you more likely to support President Trump, less likely to support President Trump, or has your opinion of President Trump stayed the same?
